## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                | Type                         | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Sets the background color of your stepper. | `"alternative" \| "primary"` | `'primary'` |
